Description: The New York Attorney General and the New York State Department of Environmental Conservation announced a $4 million agreement that resolved years of hazardous waste disposal and oil spill contamination at the former Tonawanda Forge site in Tonawanda, New York. The agreement stipulated that American Axle & Manufacturing would compensate the state of New York for costs associated with the state's cleanup of contamination at the site.
Info Source: https://ag.ny.gov/press-release/2021/attorney-general-james-and-dec-commissioner-seggos-secure-4-million-resolve
